summary: I don’t know how we’ve been sleeping on Opposite Sex for so long, I mean yes it’s from like 19 year ago and the writing is pure...
caption: I don’t know how we’ve been sleeping on Opposite Sex for so long, I mean yes it’s from like 19 year ago and the writing is pure Shit, but in episode 1 we’ve already got to see Chris play a douchey ‘playa’ like he was so prone to in the early days and now this ^^^ Yes that is our very own Evans in drag with fake-balloon tits dancing/shaking his ass to I Will Survive

title: Anything Else Is Outside - Chapter 25
body:
Summary: Things were going fine until Lisa goes to NY


The first week of their new compromise was good. Harper was staying in Jared’s apartment, as she said she would, but they went out every day. Sometimes Chris would spend the night with her, other’s she would go to his apartment. Sebastian was promoting his new movie in LA so Harper was going to the gym alone. One day Emmy was there and she went to talk to Harper while on the treadmill, she was very friendly and Harper told her the things being said on the internet was all bullshit. Emmy just waves it off, saying she was dating a businessman. Well, Harper was just happy not to have more drama about this.

She and Chris would always do something after work, but he didn’t want to go out, so it was always a movie, dinner and some game or playing music together. He’s really great with music! The woman would always try to do some little things for him, like leaving some notes hidden when she left his house or make some pudding he really wanted to prove, send him pics during the day and have hard and fast sex at night.

She imagined the second week would be the same, but then his mother went to NY and on the first night he told Harper he would be out with Lisa to some Broadway show. She was okay, even thinking he would invite her over, but eventually, she convinced herself he was looking for a better occasion to introduce them. It never came. The next two days he didn’t call or text her at all. Imagine her surprise when she was organizing her things to go out of the studio and Lisa enters the place. Chris had shown her pictures so she knew this is his mother.

“Hey, you must be Harper.”

“I am. Hey Lisa, is everything okay? Is Chris okay?” she gets worried about him, thinking maybe something happened.

“Yes, darling. He’s okay. I wanted to meet you.”

“Is he outside? Parking?” She was so confused her brain was just trying to put things together.

“No, no…he’s in a meeting. Do you think we can have a coffee?”

“Yes, sure! Do you mind if we have it at the place around the corner? I need to wait for the owner to give him the keys before I can leave…”

“Sure, it’s fine.”

Harper finish getting her things and closing the place and they go to the little dinner around the studio. When the waiter comes with their drinks, Harper finally starts functioning again. “I’m sorry, I was so surprised when you entered the studio I didn’t even know what to say. Is a pleasure to meet you, Lisa, even though I’m still a bit taken aback.”

“Is nice to meet you too, Harper. You look like a very down to earth person.”

“I guess I am.”

“Chris doesn’t know I’m here, I’m going back to Boston today but he told me we should meet next time…I usually don’t cross this kind of line, you see? I would let him introduce you to me in his own time, but I’m a bit worried, Harper.”

“About me? I’m not following…”

“Chris talks to me about his life, about everything, things had always been this way. But for some reason, he stopped talking about you and he’s acting very skittish about it. I’m not trying to pry into your relationship but we were having dinner with his friends yesterday and they’re worried about you both as a couple, so I wanted to meet you.”

Now things are making more sense. “Oh…was Adam there?”

“Yes, he’s one of the people who are worried.”

“Lisa, I know you don’t know me and they’re very close to you as well, as Chris had told me before, but there’s not much I can say to calm your mind besides that I like him a lot. We’re still getting to know each other and this caused some disagreements, but we’re good now. To be honest I was truly expecting to meet you when he told me you were here. I don’t know if he changed his mind about us, cause he hasn’t talked to me this last couple of days…I’m frustrated right now knowing the reason.”

“He looks sad and irritated, darling. I’m sure you understand this is not what a mother wants for her son’s relationship. He had struggled with depression before so I’m just trying not to let him go into this path…”

“He wasn’t…we were fine and…I don’t want him to be sad either…I don’t know what to say, I don’t think I can say anything else without talking to him.”

“Would you mind not telling him I came here?”

“Yes. I would. I’m sorry, Lisa, I can’t lie to him.”

Lisa smiles. “For some reason, that answer got me a bit less worried. Can you come with me to his apartment?”

“Yes.”

They stayed at the dinner for some minutes more till the studio’s owner got there and went to Chris’ apartment after. He was already there and was surprised to see Lisa with Harper.

“Hey. I just met your mother.”

Lisa explains all that went on and they sit at the couch while Harper gave them some space by sitting at the armchair. Chris is angry about his mother going to Harper’s work and talking about him as if he’s a kid who needs his mother protection from bad girls.

“Everything’s okay, Ma. What get’s me irritated and sad is that without any real motive they’re not okay with me and Harper even her being such a nice person. The only reason I didn’t want to introduce you right now is cause she asked me to go slower and I didn’t want to pressure her. I’m sorry, babe.”

“I just don’t want you to feel bad because of me, Chris. I want to know if this is what’s going on.”

“I’m not. Everything’s okay. Come here, let me introduce you to my mother.” she stands from the chair and walks around the center table to hold the hand he stretched on her direction. He pulls her to sit on his lap. “Mother, this is Harper, my girlfriend. She’s a very dedicated and lovely person, with a big heart and a strong personality. I’m very lucky to have her.”

Lisa smiles. “It’s nice to meet you, Harper.”
body_abstract: Summary: Things were going fine until Lisa goes to NY

Lisa smiles. “For some reason, that answer got me a bit less worried. Can you come with me to his apartment?”

“Yes.”

“Hey. I just met your mother.”

Lisa explains all that went on and they sit at the couch while Harper gave them some space by sitting at the armchair. Chris is angry about his mother going to Harper’s work and talking about him as if he’s a kid who needs his mother protection from bad girls.

“Everything’s okay, Ma. What get’s me irritated and sad is that without any real motive they’re not okay with me and Harper even her being such a nice person. The only reason I didn’t want to introduce you right now is cause she asked me to go slower and I didn’t want to pressure her. I’m sorry, babe.”

“I just don’t want you to feel bad because of me, Chris. I want to know if this is what’s going on.”

“I’m not. Everything’s okay. Come here, let me introduce you to my mother.” she stands from the chair and walks around the center table to hold the hand he stretched on her direction. He pulls her to sit on his lap. “Mother, this is Harper, my girlfriend. She’s a very dedicated and lovely person, with a big heart and a strong personality. I’m very lucky to have her.”

Lisa smiles. “It’s nice to meet you, Harper.”

blog.description: Hello! I'm glad you're here and I hope you'll stay for a little bit longer. I already love you so don't be afraid ;)

summary: A few days ago I spent a night with a guy and later on I was wearing his hoodie and he did something which I could swear I saw...
body: A few days ago I spent a night with a guy and later on I was wearing his hoodie and he did something which I could swear I saw before but I couldn’t place it. I just realized it’s the exact same thing Chris Evans’ character does in “What’s your number?” and this realization just made my day.

reblog.comment: A few days ago I spent a night with a guy and later on I was wearing his hoodie and he did something which I could swear I saw before but I couldn’t place it. I just realized it’s the exact same thing Chris Evans’ character does in “What’s your number?” and this realization just made my day.

blog.name: mom---nicole
blog.title: I Can Do This All Day💥
blog.description:
Author of: Among the waves, my heart belongs, Flame on big guy, Your Scent, Buckysbrat, and more on AO3 Header by:  
umikochannart        My Muse's are: 
leisurelypanda & 
cronchevans              ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/A217973       (Compromise where you can. Where you can't, don't. Even if everyone is telling you that something wrong is something right. Even if the whole world is telling you to move, it is your duty to plant yourself like a tree, look them in the eye, and say 'No, you move'.)

summary: Mark Ruffalo, who 'got in a lot of trouble' for spoiling 'Avengers,' asked to do press with loose-lipped Tom Holland. Instead,...
title: Mark Ruffalo, who 'got in a lot of trouble' for spoiling 'Avengers,' asked to do press with loose-lipped Tom Holland. Instead, he was paired with 'tight-lipped' Chris Evans.
excerpt: Mark Ruffalo appeared on NBC's "Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon" and said that his attempt to get paired with fellow Marvel spoiler Tom Holland got turned down quickly.

blog.name: captainrogerrsbeard
blog.title: We love who we love. Sucks.

summary:
Me: Baby, who's this?
Three year old daughter: "That's Daddy, right? Captain America." 
I'm not sure how this happened but....in...
body:
Me: Baby, who’s this?

Three year old daughter: “That’s Daddy, right? Captain America.”


I’m not sure how this happened but….in some ways, she’s not wrong…

blog.name: itsmanillablog

title: Bedtime story
body:
Pairing : Chris Evans x fem!Reader

Word count : 543

Warning : none

@sgtevanstan​

Bonjour at bienvenue á Tumblr ma copain! I’m so sorry if my French is a bit rusty but you kinda got the gist right? Anyways, welcome and I wanted to start you off by asking for a Chris Evans x reader homely/family sorta fic — have fun! (:

I had a bit of a hard time writing this one, I’ll just be honest here. So it’s not really what you asked for, I just let my imagination run wild.

“Daddy, can you tell me a story?”

You sighed, you had hoped your daughter would feel too tired to ask for one. The three of you had spent the evening at your in-laws, and the loud evening had taken a toll on your energy. You hoped your daughter would feel the same. Chris nodded, then sat against the headboard, letting one of his arms fall on her pillow.

“Once upon a time, in a small village, lived the most beautiful princess the kingdom had ever seen. Neither her mother, nor her father, lived in the castle, and none of them was part of the King’s family. But the village’s elders loved her so much, that they all believed she should be a princess. The princess was very kind, and she would always share the few riches she had with those that had none. She was brilliant, too. She was always reading the biggest books, with lots of words that few could understand.

But the princess was lonely, as the girls in the village were jealous of her beauty and intelligence, and the boys in the village were too blind to see what a beautiful heart she had. So the princess left the village to go near the castle, where more people lived, in the hopes of finding friends to talk with.

Near the castle lived the goofy prince. The goofy prince didn’t like to be serious, and he would always try to make people around him laugh. He felt lonely, too, because he would always worry too much about everything. His worries stopped him from ever finding the right princess for him, and that worried him more.

So when the prince met the beautiful princess, he started worrying again. He worried because he thought he wasn’t smart enough for the princess. He thought he was to busy for the princess because you see, such a precious princess needed all her prince’s attention. And he looked at all the princes around him, and he believed that the princess would be happier with them.

But the princess did not care. She kept talking to the prince, and when he doubted himself when the worries came back, she pushed them away. And she made the prince so happy, that he decided to ask the princess’ hand. And to the prince’s surprise, she said yes.

They got married the princess’ village, and all the elders welcomed the prince with all the kindness that could ever be. And seeing how happy the princess was, the prince decided to build the princess a small castle to live him. She didn’t want a kingdom, not even the biggest castle the prince could offer. She only wanted a place to put all her big books in, with a few rooms for the elders to stay in if they ever needed a place to stay in. Because you see, the prince had a lot to offer to the princess, but she didn’t want it all, she wanted to share with everyone. That’s how good-hearted the princess was.”

“What happened then, daddy?”

“Then, the princess gave the prince the best gift he ever could’ve thought of.”

“What is it?

“The most beautiful, the smartest, the most precious little princess the prince could’ve wished for.”

@mrsambroserollinsacklesmgk
